text: Nazdik ast, ki osmonho ʙa xotiri azamati Ilohi ʙoloi jakdigar dar ham ʙiskofand va faristagon ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorason tasʙeh megujand va Uro ta'zim menamojand va az sifathoi nosistae, ki loiq ʙa zoti U nest, ʙa poki jod mekunand va ʙaroi gunohoni ahli imoni sokinoni zamin omurzis metalaʙand. Ogoh ʙosed, ki Alloh gunohoni mu'minonro omurzanda ast va ʙo ʙandagonas mehruʙon ast
